com.google.gwt.ajaxsearch.client
Class SearchControl

java.lang.Object

              com.google.gwt.ajaxsearch.client.SearchControl
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.google.gwt.user.client.EventListener
public class SearchControl
extends com.google.gwt.user.client.ui.Composite

Encapsulates the Google Ajax Search API search control.

Constructor Detail

SearchControl

public SearchControl(SearchControlOptions options)
Constructs a new SearchControl.

Parameters:
options - Provides a configuration for displaying and executing the SearchControl's searches
Method Detail

addKeepListener

public void addKeepListener(KeepListener l)
Adds a KeepListener to the SearchControl. It is necessary to have set a keep label by invoking SearchControlOptions.setKeepLabel(java.lang.String) in order to display the keep link on the SearchControl.

Parameters:
l - A KeepListener that will receive notifications when the user clicks on a keep link in the SearchControl

addSearchListener

public void addSearchListener(SearchListener l)
Adds a listener to receive notification of all search results loaded by the SearchControl. A SearchListener added to the SearchControl will receive Result objects from all Search objects added to the SearchControl.

Parameters:
l - A SearchListener that will receive notifications when the SearchControl has received a Result.

execute

public void execute(java.lang.String query)
Programmatically execute a query. This allows the control to be seeded with an initial query and search results. Using this method is equivalent to typing a query into the SearchControl and pressing return.

Parameters:
query - A search query

removeKeepListener

public void removeKeepListener(KeepListener l)
Removes a KeepListener from the SearchControl. Removing all KeepListeners will not remove the keep links from the displayed SearchControl.

Parameters:
l - The KeepListener to remove

removeSearchListener

public void removeSearchListener(SearchListener l)
Removes a SearchListener from the SearchControl.

Parameters:
l - The SearchListener to remove
